name: Ronald Bien Jose
title: Angular frontend developer
introductions: Hello, and welcome! I'm a passionate software engineer with over a decade of experience as a software developer, dedicated to crafting clean and efficient web applications. My expertise focuses on creating responsive and dynamic user interfaces, leveraging the latest features and best practices of Angular.

I have a strong background in frontend development, with a keen eye for design and a commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable code. Whether it's building a new application from scratch or enhancing an existing one, I'm here to help bring your vision to life.

I'm well-versed in Angular's ecosystem, including RXJS for reactive programming, Angular Material for beautiful UI components, and bootstrap CSS/tailwind CSS framework for modern components and utilities. I also have experience integrating APIs and third-party services, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
